description: CD catalog number prefixes for OCR pattern matching. Prefixes are grouped by region/label family.

usage.highConfidence: Text matching these prefixes + standard number format should be treated as catalog numbers with high confidence (0.8-1.0)
usage.pattern: Most prefixes follow format: PREFIX + hyphen + 3-6 digits, optionally followed by hyphen + 1-2 digits

emi_capitol.description: EMI and Capitol Music Group (now Universal)

soul_funk_rb.description: Soul, Funk, and R&B specialized labels

NOW.label: Now That's What I Call Music

NTCD.label: Now That's What I Call Music

numbered_series.description: Common numbered catalog series from major labels

groove_neosoul.description: Groove, Neo-Soul, Acid Jazz, and Funk specialized labels

contemporary_hiphop.description: Contemporary Hip-Hop and Alternative Rap labels

exclusionPatterns.description: Patterns that look like catalog numbers but should be excluded

regexPatterns.description: Regex patterns for catalog number detection

primary.description: Standard format: 2-5 letters, optional separator, 2-6 digits, optional suffix
